About Me

Hello!, I'm Hector!

I am currently learning the world of web development. At this moment I have been focused on mastering frontend technologies, but I am excited to explore the backend side of things. I have been teaching myself web development through the course The Odin Project. I enjoy creating projects and I especially love solving problems!
